title: Cant access the essence emporium
body:
I go to store/featured and click on essence emporium... it does nothing
Help

replies.body: I'm also unable to access the essence emporium in EU WEST. Has anyone from Riot acknowledged this yet?
So is any one working to fix this. Because its broken for me also

Try refreshing your client really quick to see if that helps! The store only just launched on OCE and hasn't hit many if any other servers yet, so it may actually just need a little while to get fully up and running tbh.
I can't either. It doesn't do anything. It is bugged.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=71BuWALM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-06T23:39:40.071+0000)
>
> Try refreshing your client really quick to see if that helps! The store only just launched on OCE and hasn't hit many if any other servers yet, so it may actually just need a little while to get fully up and running tbh.

Its been 7 hours and I still cant use it (Also I'm in oce)
It says we can buy gemstones with our blue essence, is that correct?
Yes, from what I can see the cheapest is 50k BE

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yjWJjbdj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-09T01:54:27.612+0000)
>
> I don't believe clicking that page is meant to do anything tbh xD. The [**Essence Emporium**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115014872088) items include....
> 
> 1,500 BE - Mystery icon box (guaranteed to be an icon you don't already own)
> 2,000 BE - Chromas (includes all chromas that have been available for at least six months)
> 2,500 BE - “Mystery Mini” Icons Box (exclusive to the special BE store)
> 3,950 BE - Mystery Champions (guaranteed to be a champion you don't already own)
> 4,900 BE - Mystery ward skin box (guaranteed to be a ward skin you don't already own)
> 6,000 BE – Essence Collector ward skin (Exclusive to the special BE store)
> 50,000 BE - "Make it Rain" emote (exclusive to the special BE store)
> 50,000 BE and up - Gemstones (First one costs 50,000, second costs 75,000, third costs 100,000. Limited to three per account during the special BE store sale)
> 75,000 BE - “Money Bags” emote (exclusive to the special BE store)
> 150,000 BE - URFWick skin (now exclusive to the special BE store)

From a different thread, I guess the stuff on the front page of the store is all we get.
Can't enter it on EUW or NA.
I cant either since launch, EUW here
EUW here and still in the same situation. {{champion:32}}
Hmmm, yeah came here looking for advice. Can't seem to access either :/{{item:3070}}
